Package com.inrupt.client.http

Class SolidClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.http.HttpClient
      • com.inrupt.client.http.SolidClient
  • public class SolidClient
extends HttpClient
    An HTTP client for interacting with Solid Resources.

    This client extends the native Java client by introducing a SolidAuthenticator class for performing Solid-conforming authentication.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  SolidClient.Builder
      A builder of Solid HTTP Clients.
